Package controller.interfaces

Interface IStaffManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaffManager
public interface IStaffManager
This interface provides methods to manage staff in the system.
Since:
2024-11-16

  • Method Details

    • getAllStaff

      List<model.users.User> getAllStaff()
      Retrieves all staff.
      Returns:
      a List User of all staff.

    • findStaffByKeywords

      List<model.users.User> findStaffByKeywords(String keyword)
      For a given keyword, retrieves all staff whose name contains the keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      a List User of all staff whose name contains the keyword.

    • addDoctor

      void addDoctor(String name, int age, String password, model.enums.Gender gender, LocalDate dob, String emailAddress, String phoneNumber, model.enums.Specialisation specialisation)
      Adds a doctor to the system.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the doctor.
      age - the age of the doctor.
      password - the password of the doctor.
      gender - the gender of the doctor.
      dob - the date of birth of the doctor.
      emailAddress - the email address of the doctor.
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the doctor.
      specialisation - the specialisation of the doctor.

    • addAdmin

      Parameters:

      age - the age of the admin.
      password - the password of the admin.
      gender - the gender of the admin.
      dob - the date of birth of the admin.
      emailAddress - the email address of the admin.
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the admin.
